sense.def:
To defeat someone
pomeni zmagati nad nekom v bitki, igri ali na tekmovanju.

Če je predlog ali pobuda v razpravi
defeated
, več oseb glasuje proti njemu kakor zanj.

seg.quote: The motion was defeated by 221 votes to 152.

sense.def:
Če neka naloga ali težava
defeats someone
, je tako težavna, da je človek ne more opraviti ali rešiti.

seg.quote: ...a complex sum which defeats many adults as well as children.

sense.def:
To defeat an action or plan
pomeni povzročiti, da neka akcija ali načrt spodleti.

seg.quote: He would like to see the strike defeated.

sense.def:
Defeat
je stanje, ko nas nekdo premaga v bitki, igri ali na natečaju ali ko ne uresničimo tistega, kar smo želeli.

seg.quote: The bad weather contributed to the defeat of the navy.
These defeats came as a setback for Thorne.
Her friend finally gave up in defeat.
